actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to expand the current provision of medical assistance to certain uninsured women who have been screened and found to have breast or cervical cancer to also cover ovarian and uterine cancer.
short_title: Ovarian and Uterine Cancer Prevention and Treatment Act of 2002

summary.text: Ovarian and Uterine Cancer Prevention and Treatment Act of 2002 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to allow State plans for medical assistance the option to provide medical treatment for ovarian or uterine cancer to certain individuals who have been screened for such cancer under an appropriate program of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

titles.title: Ovarian and Uterine Cancer Prevention and Treatment Act of 2002

To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to expand the current provision of medical assistance to certain uninsured women who have been screened and found to have breast or cervical cancer to also cover ovarian and uterine cancer.
